sentences.sContent: ...a special protein which triggers the animal to shed its fleece.
sentences.sCn: …一种能够促使这种动物脱毛的特殊蛋白质。

synos.tran: 羊毛，绒头织物；羊毛制的覆盖物

phrases.pCn: 金羊毛（希腊神话中出现的一件宝物）

remMethod.val: flee(逃跑) + ce → 骗完钱就跑 → 骗取

words.tran: 覆盖羊毛的；羊毛状的；羊毛似的；轻软的

trans.tranCn: 羊毛(尤指未剪下的), 羊毛状之物, 绒头织物, 羊毛大衣呢
trans.tranOther: the woolly coat of a sheep, especially the wool and skin of a sheep when it has been made into a piece of clothing
